about_the_game:
Bestiario is a JRPG set in a Spain inhabited by mythological creatures. The title has elements of Social Sim as one of its main inspirations is the Persona saga.

With Bestiario we aim to bring back those turn-based combat RPGs with great and exciting stories where you connect with the characters while living great and exciting adventures.

Creating a magical world focused on Spain has allowed us to discover a new and exciting mythology that will surprise many of you with the richness of its culture.

The fearsome Ojancano is a huge cyclops with ten fingers on each hand that is almost impossible to defeat. The Cocollona is a nun who, when she sins, turns into a crocodile with butterfly wings. The tarasca is a giant snake with a strange carapace, capable of invoking meteorological phenomena. We could be taken to ad infinitum.
The Goddess Mari awaits you peacefully in her cave and many more mythological creatures are awaiting for you in Bestiario!

Not everything will be about fighting. Like in Persona, there will be a calendar system that will allow you to take a series of actions before moving on to the next chapter in the main story.

You will be able to develop your character and explore the story further thanks to its social simulator.

You will have time to defeat evil creatures at disruptions while also spending some time doing side quests, playing minigames like Chinchon and interacting with other characters.

What will you find in Bestiario?

  • Deep and intuitive character customisation system.
  • Combat system inspired by the Grandia saga.
  • More than 30 hours to complete the main story and much more if you want to complete it.
  • Unique artwork and graphical style.
  • Unique and original soundtrack in the genre.
